languages.text: Твердое и неудобное ложе для сомно-медитации снабжено нейропортами, соединяющими спящего с когитаторной сетью монастыря.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Эти столы используются местными жрецами как кровати. Аскетичные и технологичные

languages.text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.
languages.original_text: Твердое и неудобное ложе для сомно-медитации снабжено нейропортами, соединяющими спящего с когитаторной сетью монастыря.

traits.locale_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

languages.text: Das harte, unbequeme Somno-Meditationsbett ist mit Neuralports ausgestattet, um den Schlafenden mit dem Cogitatoren-Netzwerk des Klosters zu verbinden.
languages.original_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

traits.locale_text: Das harte, unbequeme Somno-Meditationsbett ist mit Neuralports ausgestattet, um den Schlafenden mit dem Cogitatoren-Netzwerk des Klosters zu verbinden.

languages.text: Le lit de somnoméditation, dur et inconfortable, est équipé de ports neuraux qui relient le dormeur au réseau de cogitateurs du monastère.
languages.original_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

traits.locale_text: Le lit de somnoméditation, dur et inconfortable, est équipé de ports neuraux qui relient le dormeur au réseau de cogitateurs du monastère.

languages.text: 这张又硬又不舒服的休憩冥想床配备了神经接口，可以将睡眠者与修道院的沉思者网络连接起来。
languages.original_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

traits.locale_text: 这张又硬又不舒服的休憩冥想床配备了神经接口，可以将睡眠者与修道院的思考器网络连接起来。

languages.text: 硬くて寝心地の悪い睡眠瞑想用ベッドには神経ポートが付いており、眠った者は修道院の考算機ネットワークに接続できる。
languages.original_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

traits.locale_text: 硬くて寝心地の悪い睡眠瞑想用ベッドには神経ポートが付いていて、眠った者は修道院の考算機ネットワークに接続できる。

languages.text: La dura e incómoda cama de somnomeditación está equipada con puertos neuronales para conectar al durmiente con la red de cogitadores del monasterio.
languages.original_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

traits.locale_text: La dura e incómoda cama de somnomeditación está equipada con puertos neuronales para conectar al durmiente con la red de cogitadores del monasterio.

languages.text: Sert ve rahatsız uykulu meditasyon yatağı, uyuyan kişiyi manastırın kavramsayar ağına bağlayacak sinirsel girişlerle donatılmış.
languages.original_text: The hard, uncomfortable somno-meditation bed is equipped with neural ports to connect the sleeper to the monastery's cogitator network.

traits.locale_text: Sert ve rahatsız uykulu meditasyon yatağı, uyuyan kişiyi manastırın kavramsayar ağına bağlayacak sinirsel girişlerle donatılmış.
